body_html:
Strange, libtensorflow_demo.so should be less than 1mb.

Which NDK do you have installed? The recommended version for Bazel right now is r12b. Others may have unexpected behavior.

If you copy the following flags from libtensorflow_inference.so, does that help at all?

    copts = tf_copts() + [
        "-ffunction-sections",
        "-fdata-sections",
    ],
    linkopts = if_android([
...
        "-Wl,--gc-sections",
...
    ]),

Another option is to download the prebuilt binaries from https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-android/

body:
Strange, libtensorflow_demo.so should be less than 1mb.

Which NDK do you have installed? The recommended version for Bazel right now is r12b. Others may have unexpected behavior.

If you copy the following flags from libtensorflow_inference.so, does that help at all?

```
    copts = tf_copts() + [
        "-ffunction-sections",
        "-fdata-sections",
    ],
    linkopts = if_android([
...
        "-Wl,--gc-sections",
...
    ]),
```

Another option is to download the prebuilt binaries from [https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-android/](https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-android/)
